title: Make a fixed price offer
description: Makes a fixed price offer for an auction to the specified members. The auction must have finished closing and must have been in the closed state for less than 45 days.
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

fields.name: ListingId
fields.description: The ID of the listing to make the offer on.

fields.name: Price
fields.description: The price of the offer. Truncated to two decimal places.

fields.name: Duration
fields.description: The duration the offer is valid for (one, three or seven days).

fields.name: Quantity
fields.description: The quantity of items available. Only applicable if the original listing was Buy Now only. The maximum is 1000.

fields.name: MemberIds
fields.description: The list of member IDs corresponding to the members to send the offer to.

returns.description: <FixedPriceOfferResponse> Details on whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.

fields.name: Code
fields.description:
The result code of the offer response.

                                This field is always zero.  Do not use.
